channel.title: ftp brute force on Kiel Vaughn, CISSP

item.title: Chili
item.description: Chili is a vulnerable system found on VulnHub. Below are the steps I utilized to compromise this vulnerable box. First, after importing the machine, I ran netdiscover -i eth0 to discover the IP address of the host. Next, I ran threader3000 to enumerate the TCP ports that were open on this host and let it complete it’s recommended nmap scan. It appears that there is both a web server and FTP running on this host.
